title: SHARP SMC0761KS Oven Countertop Microwave, 0.7 CuFt, Stainless Steel
description: SMC0761KS Compact 0.7 cu. Ft. Microwave is ideal for snacks, beverages, frozen meals and reheating. Its small footprint fits just about anywhere, while its roomy 10" carousel turntable is big enough for a full-size dinner plate. Glossy finish with scratch-resistant glass door complements your style
